data.question: What is the main design strategy introduced for evolving the topology of highly connected rare-earth metal-organic frameworks (RE-MOFs)?
What is the symmetry of the pivot group in the linker L-SO2 used in the synthesis of a new MOF topology?
What topology is formed when combining L-SO2 with 12-connected RE9 clusters?
What change in stacking behavior is observed when replacing L-SO2 with a tetrahedral linker L-O?
data.answer: The stacking behavior switches from an eclipsed mode to a staggered stacking mode.

data.question: What topology results from the combination of the RE cluster and a linker [(L-(CH3)6)] with more bulky groups?
Is the dfs topology of PCN-905-SO2 derived from the aea-MOF-1?
Does the linker L-O lead to the discovery of an hjz topology?
Is the dfs net constructed from 2D layers pillared by 12-c RE9 clusters?
What is the effect of replacing the pivot group with an -O- unit in the linker?
data.answer: It alters the linker symmetry and decreases it to C1.

data.question: What is the crystallographic space group of PCN-905-SO2?
What is the dihedral angle between the two central phenyl rings in the linker L-SO2 within PCN-905-SO2?
Does the introduction of molecular pivot groups and substituents into rotamers induce the formation of novel flexible topologies?
Can the diversity of RE-MOFs be enhanced through post-synthetic installation of linkers with various functional groups?
Is the thermal decomposition of PCN-90X(RE) series starting at around 250 degrees Celsius?
What is the role of 2-fluorobenzoic acid (2-FBA) in the synthesis of PCN-905-SO2?
data.answer: It induces the in situ formation of polynuclear RE clusters (RE6 or RE9) for the construction of extended MOFs.

data.question: What is the point symbol of the dfs net determined by TOPOS 4.0?
Does the dfs net represent a rare RE-MOF with mesoporosity and flexibility?
What is the effect of bulky methyl groups on the dihedral angle between the two hinges in the linker?
data.answer: It generates larger dihedral angles and forces two peripheral phenyl rings perpendicular to the central one.

data.question: What is the space group of PCN-908-(CH3)6?
Is the linker L-O configuration change leading to a staggered stacking mode of hcb layers in PCN-906-O?
